knimeNode.name: Inductive Miner (Table)
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node implements the Inductive Miner to discover a process tree from an event table.

fullDescription.intro: This node wraps the ProM's plug-in "Mine efficient tree with Inductive Miner" from the package InductiveMiner. This node is used to discover a process tree from an event table. A process tree is a block-structured process model where the (inner) nodes are operators (such as sequence, choice, parallel, and loop) and the leaves are activities. The inductive miner guarantees the discovery of a sound process model. The discovered process tree can be converted into a Petri net.
